code: import React from'react';import{Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import'./Navigation.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navigation=()=>{const location=useLocation();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"navigation",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/",className:"nav-logo",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"logo-icon",children:"\uD83E\uDDE0"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"logo-text",children:"Memory Tiles"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-links",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"nav-link ".concat(location.pathname==='/'?'active':''),children:"Home"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/contact",className:"nav-link ".concat(location.pathname==='/contact'?'active':''),children:"Contact"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/privacy-policy",className:"nav-link ".concat(location.pathname==='/privacy-policy'?'active':''),children:"Privacy Policy"})]})]})});};export default Navigation;
